Sp-L: Ragnaroks!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Shrine (Passwords and Unlocking): Special Breeds and Legendary Breeds: Sp-L: Ragnaroks!
By Thorr on Friday, December 13, 2002 - 09:03 pm:

Alas, the mighty Ragnaroks is in hand!! The following conditions need to be met in order to get Ragnaroks:

1) You must have acquired Diva by beating the Emperor's Cup a second time.

2) You must be at the Ranch on Apr 1.

3) You must have a Class A or better monster that is considered have to power of Light. Don't ask me exactly how this works, but the dialogue indicated that my monster had the power of Light which could be used against the dark dragon. My only guess is that you gave to be part Gali because they are considered Gods. It also could be only "Sprite" monsters. The Monster I used to get him was an Angel (Pixie/Gali).

4) You must have received the introduction to Ragnaroks. This is a dialogue between Aroma, Zest and Holly that happened when they stop by for a visit.

When the conditions are met, on Apr 1 A long warning about a Dragon on the rampage will be given. It will start out with Holly saying something like: I thought I heard someone screaming!

Ragnaroks will eventually come and your monster will fight him. Ragnaroks is 700+ in all stats but 2. He has a 688 speed and a 913 life. If you defeat ragnaroks, you will unlock him and receive the Tablet "DRG_RGN" which can be used to regenerate him. Of course, you can still combine Diva with Monol to get him as well. If you fail to defeat him, he will get up and run away. You can face him again in a year.

It is unknown at this time whether or not acquiring Ragnaroks will unlock other Legendary dragons. If anyone finds passwords for other legendary dragons, please post them so that we can test this. I would imagine that it is like the Pixies where unlocking Valkyrie seems to unlock the other Legendary pixies.

-Thorr

By Thorr on Friday, December 13, 2002 - 09:58 pm:

Small Addendum:

If you fail to beat Ragnaroks the first time, he will come by ervery 4 months to try again. you don't have to wait a whole year.

-Thorr

By Thorr on Sunday, December 15, 2002 - 03:06 pm:

I think you can do it with any Gali type. It stands to reason since Ragnaroks is part Monol (Ragnaroks = Diva + Monol). The Monol and the Gali are diametrically opposed. A monster that is part Gali would have the power of light.

-Thorr
